description:
Valentine`s Day! I said the same thing in Episode 4, didn`t I? Handmade chocolate is a dangerous mission, but Sensei-chan attempts it for the sake of redemption. Not surprisingly, she fails. The fool! She`ll need Tsumorin`s help. Bring us Tsumorin!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Merveilleux chocolat / Philosophie chocolatée / Une chambre couleur d`ambre / Rattrapés par la nuit blanche
Wonderful Chocolate / Chocolate Philosophy / Ameiro no Heya / Nemurenu Yoru ni Tsukamaeta
Wonderful Chocolate / Chocolate Philosophy / Tan-Colored Room / Caught You on a Sleepless Night

원더풀 초콜렛 / Chocolate Philosophy / 사탕색 방 / 잠 못드는 밤에 발목 잡히다
